_README.description: Model metadata for Google's Gemini API access.
_README.usage: Models listed here are exposed directly through the Gemini provider. Aliases are case-insensitive.

field_descriptions.aliases: Array of short names users can type instead of the full model name
field_descriptions.context_window: Total number of tokens the model can process (input + output combined)
field_descriptions.max_output_tokens: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate in a single response
field_descriptions.max_thinking_tokens: Maximum reasoning/thinking tokens the model will allocate when extended thinking is requested
field_descriptions.supports_extended_thinking: Whether the model supports extended reasoning tokens (currently none do via OpenRouter or custom APIs)
field_descriptions.supports_json_mode: Whether the model can guarantee valid JSON output
field_descriptions.supports_function_calling: Whether the model supports function/tool calling
field_descriptions.supports_images: Whether the model can process images/visual input
field_descriptions.max_image_size_mb: Maximum total size in MB for all images combined (capped at 40MB max for custom models)
field_descriptions.supports_temperature: Whether the model accepts temperature parameter in API calls (set to false for O3/O4 reasoning models)
field_descriptions.temperature_constraint: Type of temperature constraint: 'fixed' (fixed value), 'range' (continuous range), 'discrete' (specific values), or omit for default range
field_descriptions.use_openai_response_api: Set to true when the model must use the /responses endpoint (reasoning models like GPT-5 Pro). Leave false/omit for standard chat completions.
field_descriptions.default_reasoning_effort: Default reasoning effort level for models that support it (e.g., 'low', 'medium', 'high'). Omit if not applicable.
field_descriptions.intelligence_score: 1-20 human rating used as the primary signal for auto-mode model ordering
field_descriptions.allow_code_generation: Whether this model can generate and suggest fully working code - complete with functions, files, and detailed implementation instructions - for your AI tool to use right away. Only set this to 'true' for a model more capable than the AI model / CLI you're currently using.

models.description: Gemini 2.5 Pro with computer use capabilities (1M context) - Specialized for UI interaction and agent automation
State-of-the-art thinking model capable of reasoning over complex problems (1M context)
Best model in terms of price-performance with thinking mode (1M context) - High-throughput enterprise tasks
Gemini 2.5 Flash Preview (1M context) - Latest preview with improved agentic tool use and efficiency
Fastest flash model optimized for cost-efficiency (1M context) - Low-latency, high-volume tasks
Image generation model (65K context) - Specialized for generating images
Gemini 2.0 Flash (1M context, 8K output) - Experimental thinking mode
Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite (1M context, 8K output) - Fast and efficient without thinking mode
